long_description: The wrap-around SunCloud Detour polarized sunglasses cut glare and shield your eyes from wind, dust and gravel when you're racing down the trail or burning up the track. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lenses block 85% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and a third the weight; they're also acid- and heat-resistant. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Slip-resistant rubber nose pads and temple ends become tacky when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. The SunCloud Detour polarized sunglasses best fit medium profiles. Closeout.
short_description: The wrap-around SunCloud Detour polarized sunglasses cut glare and shield your eyes from wind, dust and gravel when you're racing down the trail or burning up the track.
